operations.summary: Get the list of alerts generated on any Cluster.
Get the list of events generated on any Cluster.

operations.notes: Get a Cluster with the specified id.

operations.summary: Get the list of alerts generated on a specified Cluster.
Get the list of events generated on a specified Cluster.
Get the stats for a specified Cluster.
operations.notes: If start time and end time are included in the query string, then historical stats are retrieved. Otherwise, the latest stats are retrieved.

responseMessages.message: Any internal exception while performing this operation

actions.description: Possible actions to resolve this alert

chartQueries.description: Charts that are relevant to this cause

hasGlobalDetails.description: Whether the alert has global details or not

numResolvedCount.description: Number of times this cause has resolved the alert

parentCauseId.description: Id of the alert/cause this is a possible cause for

troubleshootingSteps.description: Steps to determine whether this is the cause.

severity.description: This field describes the severity of the alert.

metricDetails.description: List of metric details associated with the alert
metricDetails.notes: List of metric details associated with the alert

severityTrails.description: List that contains severity level change details
severityTrails.notes: List that contains severity level change details

comparisonOperator.description: Comparison Operator to be applied for teh values.

conditionType.description: Condition Type that the current metric is associated with.
conditionType.notes: Condition Type that the current metric is associated with.

metricValueDetails.description: List of metric values at different instances of time in the alert lifecycle
metricValueDetails.notes: List of metric values at different instances of time in the alert lifecycle

metricThresholdValue.description: Threshold value of the metric that was specified in the policy at that given time.
metricThresholdValue.notes: Threshold value of the metric that was specified in the policy at that given time.

metricValue.description: Actual value of the metric at that given time.
metricValue.notes: Actual value of the metric at that given time.

stateChangeTimeStampInUsecs.description: Time at which the alert's state change occurred.
stateChangeTimeStampInUsecs.notes: Time at which the alert's state change occurred.

severity.description: Severity level of the alert. Can be INFO, WARNING or CRITICAL
severity.notes: Severity level of the alert. Can be INFO, WARNING or CRITICAL

severityChangeTimestampInUsecs.description: Time at which the severity level change occurred
severityChangeTimestampInUsecs.notes: Time at which the severity level change occurred

allHypervNodesInFailoverCluster.description: If the cluster includes Hyper-V nodes, then this property indicates whether all the Hyper-V nodes in the NOS cluster (that are not marked for removal)are a part of a Hyper-V failover cluster

clusterFunctions.description: This field describes the type of cluster

clusterUuid.description: Uuid of the cluster this entity belongs to

credential.description: If the cluster includes Hyper-V nodes, then this propertyindicates the credential for the account that has permissions to modify the domain account representing the NOS cluster

domain.description: If the cluster includes Hyper-V nodes, then this property indicates the AD domain name that this cluster is a part of

enforceRackableUnitAwarePlacement.description: Indicates whether RackableUnit (RU) aware placement has been enforced.

gpuDriverVersion.description: Host driver version of the GPU

nosClusterAndHostsDomainJoined.description: If the cluster includes Hyper-V nodes, then this property indicates whether the NOS cluster and the constituent hosts are all joined to the same domain

ssdPinningPercentageLimit.description: This field describes the allowable percentage pinning on the ssd

storageType.description: This field describes the storage type of cluster

externalClientEnabled.description: Indicates whether external iscsi initiators are enabled or not

port.description: Port on which proxy is binding
port.notes: Any port number which is in the range 0 - 65536

proxyTypes.description: Proxy types to send applicable traffic
proxyTypes.notes: Proxy types to send applicable traffic. Supports 'http' 'https', and 'socks' proxy configuration.

port.notes: Any port number which is in the range 0 - 65536

drsEnabled.description: Denotes if DRS is enabled or not. Applicable only for vCenter.
drsEnabled.notes: Denotes if DRS is enabled or not.

drsVmBehaviour.description: Denotes if DRS is enabled or not. Applicable only for vCenter.
drsVmBehaviour.notes: Denotes if DRS is enabled or not.

haEnabled.description: Denotes if HA is enabled or not.
haEnabled.notes: Denotes if HA is enabled or not.

inUse.description: Indicates whether any host is managed by this server or not.
inUse.notes: Indicates whether any host is managed by this server or not.

registered.description: Denotes whether the server is registered with Nutanix or not
registered.notes: Denotes whether the server is registered with Nutanix or not
